function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of appropriate isolation and reporting of COVID-19 cases","Impact":"Increased spread of COVID-19 and concealment of reported cases","Mitigation":"Encouraging self-monitoring, reporting, and strict workplace policies","Technologies":"Digital reporting systems, thermal scanning, and isolation room infrastructure","People":"Employees, general public","Owner":"Employers, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Restrictions on COVID-19 testing by private sector","Impact":"Limiting monitoring of COVID-19 spread and concealing reported cases","Mitigation":"Advocating for expanded testing capabilities and public-private partnerships","Technologies":"Rapid testing kits, mobile testing units","People":"Public, healthcare providers","Owner":"Public health authorities, policymakers"},{"Description":"Lack of workplace flexibilities and protections","Impact":"Inability to implement risk-based nonpunitive leave policies, limited remote work, and high workforce occupancy","Mitigation":"Supporting remote work, advocating for labor policies, and improving infrastructure for remote work","Technologies":"Remote work software, communication tools, digital infrastructure","People":"Workers, employers","Owner":"Government, employers"}]}
